metadata.title: CVE-2023-32435 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved state management.This issue is fixed in macOS Ventura 13.3, Safari 16.4, iOS 16.4 and iPadOS16.4, iOS 15.7.7 and iPadOS 15.7.7. Processing web content may lead toarbitrary code execution. Apple is aware of a report that this issue mayhave been actively exploited against versions of iOS released before iOS15.7.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-32435` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.40.0-3ubuntu1
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.1 - 2.40.0-3ubuntu1
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-6.0 - 2.40.0-3ubuntu1
gir1.2-webkit-6.0 - 2.40.0-3ubuntu1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.40.0-3ubuntu1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.1 - 2.40.0-3ubuntu1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.40.0-3ubuntu1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.40.0-3ubuntu1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.1-0 - 2.40.0-3ubuntu1
libjavascriptcoregtk-6.0-1 - 2.40.0-3ubuntu1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.40.0-3ubuntu1
libwebkit2gtk-4.1-0 - 2.40.0-3ubuntu1
libwebkitgtk-6.0-4 - 2.40.0-3ubuntu1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.40.0-3ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.40.0-3ubuntu1').
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
